name: d3-word-wrap
description: Provides word wrapping for text elements drawn with d3.

scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-word-wrap.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-word-wrap.js -c -m -o build/d3-word-wrap.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-word-wrap.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-wrap.js build/d3-word-wrap.min.js
